#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cmath>
#include<cctype>
#include<cstring>
#include<string>
#include<algorithm>
#include<stack>
#include<vector>
using namespace std;

main()
{
      int tc;
      scanf("%d", &tc);
      while(tc--)
      {
            int n,l,i= 0,cnt = 0;
            scanf("%d %d", &n, &l);
            while(cnt<n)
            {
                    //cout<<i<<endl;
                    ++i;  
                    int x = i;
                    bool check = 1;  
                    while(x>0)
                    {
                        int d = x % 10;
                        x = x/10;
                        if(d == l)
                        {
                             check = 0;
                             break;
                        }
                    }
                    if(check)
                        cnt++;
            }
            printf("%d\n", i);
      }
}
